Class Levels

java.lang.Object
pl.gda.pg.elektronikaodpodstaw.levels.Levels
public class Levels extends Object
Serves as the central repository for the entire game content. It contains content for each level including name, theory and Stages. This class also stores the start and end messages, along with utility methods for randomizing calculation exercises.

  • Field Summary

    Fields

    Field
    Description
    static List<Level>

    A static list containing all levels of the game.

  • Constructor Details

    • Levels

      public Levels()
      Provides static methods and data for managing the levels in the game. This class is not intended to be instantiated.

  • Method Details

    • startMessage

      public static void startMessage(MainFrame frame) throws BadLocationException
      Displays the introductory message when a new game is started.
      Parameters:
      frame - the main application frame where the message is displayed.
      Throws:
      BadLocationException - if an error occurs while inserting text into the document.

    • endMessage

      public static void endMessage(MainFrame frame)
      Displays the end message after the final level is completed.
      Parameters:
      frame - the main application frame where the message is displayed.

    • initializeLevels

      public static void initializeLevels()
      Initializes the list of levels for the game, loading their names, theories, and stages into the static levels list.

    • calculatePotential

      private static int calculatePotential(int a, int b)
      Calculates the potential as the sum of two integers (also used in one answer stage to get sum).
      Parameters:
      a - the first integer.
      b - the second integer.
      Returns:
      the calculated potential.

    • calculateLength

      private static int calculateLength(double a, double b)
      Calculates the length of conductor rounded to integer based on the given parameters at exercise.
      Parameters:
      a - resistance.
      b - resistivity.
      Returns:
      the calculated length rounded to the nearest integer.

    • calculateVoltage

      private static double calculateVoltage(double a, double b)
      Calculates the voltage as the product of two double values (resistance*current).
      Parameters:
      a - resistance.
      b - current.
      Returns:
      the calculated voltage.

    • calculateCurrent

      private static double calculateCurrent(double a, double b)
      Calculates the current using the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      a - resistance.
      b - voltage.
      Returns:
      the calculated current in milliamperes.

    • calculateSourcePower

      private static String calculateSourcePower(int a, int b, int c)
      Calculates the power of a source based on 2 series resistors and current.
      Parameters:
      a - the first resistance.
      b - the second resistance.
      c - current
      Returns:
      the calculated power as a string with units using ValueToUnit method.

    • ValueToUnit

      private static String ValueToUnit(double value)
      Converts a numerical value into metric prefix.
      Parameters:
      value - the value to convert.
      Returns:
      the formatted value in metric prefix.
